name: fguillot/simple-queue
description: Abstraction layer for multiple queue systems

suggest.pda/pheanstalk: Required to use the Beanstalk queue driver (~3.0).
suggest.mariano/disque-php: Required to use the Disque queue driver (~2.0).
suggest.php-amqplib/php-amqplib: Required to use the RabbitMQ queue driver (2.6.*).
